title: HELP! The application was unable to start correctly (0x0000005)
body: I went to restart the client for the recent patch 7.11 and now I can't play league at all! The error "The application was unable to start correctly (0x0000005)" pops up every time. I uninstalled league and tried to open it up again, but the same error appeared. Please help. ;-;

replies.body: Hey Sinfuly, is this your first time patching since the transition to the updated client?  This error can happen if old or bad game files fail to update properly, in addition to security settings blocking those files from installing correctly.  My suggestion here would be to go through each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that exceptions are being added for your game files.  Once complete, use the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to clean reinstall and fix up any of those bad game data.  I hope that helps!

1. Close the client
2. Delete "lol_patcher" file in Riot Games/League Of Legends/RADS/projects
3. Reopen the client

Let us know if this works.
